trans-unit.source: Represents a 3-D rotation of a specified angle about a specified axis.
trans-unit.target: 表示以指定的角度繞著指定軸進行立體旋轉。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt specifies an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D> as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt applies an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄適用於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>至<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a 3-D rotation.
trans-unit.target: 建立 3-D 旋轉的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a 3-D rotation.
trans-unit.target: 建立 3-D 旋轉的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> that specifies the axis around which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />，指定要繞著哪一個軸旋轉。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the angle of rotation, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 雙精度浮點數，指定旋轉角度 (以度數為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a 3-D rotation using the specified axis and angle.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的軸和角度，建立立體旋轉的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt specifies an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D> as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>為<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D.Rotation%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle of a 3-D rotation, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定立體旋轉角度 (以度數為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the angle of a 3-D rotation, in degrees.
trans-unit.target: 雙精度浮點數，指定立體旋轉角度 (以度數為單位)。

trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt applies an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄適用於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>至<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Angle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Angle" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt uses this property as the target of an animation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄會使用這個屬性做為目標的動畫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the axis of a 3-D rotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定立體旋轉軸。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> that specifies the axis of rotation.
trans-unit.target: 指定旋轉軸的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt applies an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄適用於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D>至<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Axis" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D.Axis" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code excerpt uses this property as the target of an animation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼摘錄會使用這個屬性做為目標的動畫。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.AxisAngleRotation3D" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
